contents.sentence:
Were the equipment speeds in accordance with the following:
(a) When laying mixtures with density not controlled by cores, the speed of the paver shall not exceed 50 ft per minute.
(b) Rollers shall be operated to avoid shoving of the HMA and at speeds not to exceed 3 mph.
(c) Vibratory rollers will be limited to 2.5 mph.

Operating equipment at the specified speed will help to avoid the segregation of material and not outpace the roller equipment allowing asphalt to cool to temperatures below target range for compaction.
a. If laying mixtures satisfy at least one of the following three conditions, confirm: paver speed < 50 ft per minute

.
    i. Open graded mixture.
    ii. The total planned lay rate to be placed over a shoulder existing prior to the contract award is less than 385 lb/sq yd.
    iii. The first lift of material placed at less than 385 lb/sq yd over a shoulder existing prior to the contract award.

b. If the type of the roller is tandem, three-wheel, pneumatic tire, or oscillatory roller: [Roller Speed] < 3 mph.
c. If the type of the roller is vibratory roller: [Roller Speed] < 2.5 mph.

reference.author: Pistrol et. al.
reference.title: Movement of vibrating and oscillating drums and its influence on soil compaction
